item.description:
Let's go out for brunch at the B-Side, located at 92 Hampshire Street, Cambridge.

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes because a reservation has been made.

My two pet peeves: Late-comers and no-shows. They will be tarred and feathered! :-)

Late-comers will probably be turned away, especially if we have already ordered our food. I will not hold up the restaurant for a late-comer. Thanks for understanding!

And no-shows are a no-no!

Otherwise, I'm sweet as pie! Really!

Check out the following website:

http://www.bsideloung...

We'll have one check for the table. Please bring cash!

Call me at 617-999-9094 if you need to cancel at the last minute.

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Brunch
